Instance.description: A PreferenceItem subtype that uses the object's style's tags to define the preference.

TunableTuple.name: style_tags
TunableTuple.description: Validate the tags of the style of the target object against. Style tags can be found in the catalog here: Styles-> Object Styles-> Tags.

TunableEnum.name: test_type
TunableEnum.description: How to test the tags in the tag set against the objects on the lot.
